artist: Painter: After Frans van Mieris the Elder; Engraver: Carl de Moor
inscription:
Signature,Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black: FRANCISCUS A MIERIS / Pictor Leidensis | in pencil on sheet 2-67 | under image on mount in brown: H. 7" 11"'  L. 5" 9"'  | on mount below image in brown:  C.Moor sc.
life_date: After Frans van Mieris the Elder, Painter, Dutch, 1635–1681; Carl de Moor, Engraver, Dutch, 1656–1738
title: Portrait of Frans van Mieris
